name: Home World (GGJ19 Entry)
description:
Connect with your friends around the world.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/plinke-music/sets/global-game-jam-2019-homeworld

Due to MIDI functionality, a web build is impossible.

Source Code
  • Download: https://github.com/BrutalHack/ggj19
  • License: GPL v3
Technology used

Unity, Photoshop, Jetbrains Rider, Git

Help / Controls

Use the Arrow Keys to move horizontally with the bass drum and vertically with the snare drum.

Game Jam
  • Global Game Jam 2019
  • Theme: What home means to you
  • Time: 45 hours
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Code)
  • Sergej Tihonov (Code)
  • Stefanie Curth (Art)
  • Christian Plinke (Music & Sound)
  • Henrik Porath (Art, Animation)
  • Toni Michael Sattler (Art, Voice Acting)
